episodes.title: Uganda’s Deadliest Cult: The Kanungu Massacre Explained
episodes.description:
In 2000, over 700 people died in what became known as the Kanungu Massacre — one of the deadliest cult tragedies in history. This video tells the true story of the MRTCG, or the Movement for the Restoration of the Ten Commandments of God, a Ugandan cult that promised salvation but led hundreds to their deaths. Discover how it started, what the cult believed, and how it all ended in one of Uganda’s darkest chapters.

Disclaimer:
This video covers real historical events and is intended for educational and storytelling purposes only. It does not support or promote any of the actions or beliefs discussed. Viewer discretion is advised.
